data.title: The Thing: Post-film Q&A with Keith David
data.meta_description: OFS proudly presents a special screening of John Carpenter’s sci-fi/horror classic, The Thing, followed by a Q&A session with Keith David. The first 50 attendees through the door will  …
data.meta_site_name: The JOLT News Organization, A 501(c)(3) Nonprofit Organization
data.text:
OFS proudly presents a special screening of John Carpenter’s sci-fi/horror classic, The Thing, followed by a Q&A session with Keith David. The first 50 attendees through the door will receive a special limited edition poster signed by the actor.

About Keith David: Keith David is a classically trained, multiple Emmy award-winning actor. He stars, alongside Zoe Saldana, in the recently released Netflix limited series “From Scratch.” Keith was featured in Jordan Peele’s latest film “Nope.” He starred in the TV series “Greenleaf” for Oprah Winfrey’s OWN network for 5 seasons. He starred in “Black As Night” for Blumhouse / Amazon. On the big screen, Keith co-starred with Chadwick Boseman in “21 Bridges”. Prior credits include “Night School” with Kevin Hart and Tiffany Haddish and “Tales from the Hood 2”. Additional titles include the Academy Award-winning films “Crash” and “Platoon.” He is widely recognized for appearing in the highly-acclaimed films Disney’s “The Princess and the Frog”, “Requiem for a Dream”, “Men at Work”, “They Live”, “There’s Something About Mary”, and “The Thing.”
